title: Faris
description:
Four men... One challenge.

The Dad Bod Doms are ready to put the spark back in their relationships and prove their mettle.
He stalked her. Watched her. And took her for his own. Faris is domineering, possessive, and harbors a dark secret he never told anyone until her. Leyla is sultry, seductive, and Faris' secret is her deepest desire. They were a match made in heaven until things went to hell. Now they have one chance to salvage their love, their life, their family, their home. But it’s not going to happen in the boardroom or PTA meetings. They're back to where it all began: in the dungeon where he’d first seen her on her knees, begging for release… As he watched her.
author: Shane Starrett
